Operation 'applicationsAll' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description is identical to summary and provides no actionable information. Added details about pagination support (cursor-based as per API design), filtering capabilities, return structure, and metadata to help AI agents understand how to use this list operation effectively.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve all applications with filtering and pagination
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of all applications in the ATS system. Supports cursor-based pagination via limit and cursor parameters. Optionally filter applications by job ID, applicant ID, status, or other criteria. Returns an array of application objects with metadata including pagination cursors for navigating through results.
data.reasoning: Original description is identical to summary and provides no actionable information. Added details about pagination support (cursor-based as per API design), filtering capabilities, return structure, and metadata to help AI agents understand how to use this list operation effectively.

message: Operation 'applicationsAdd' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks all essential details. Enhanced to specify what data is required (applicant and job IDs), what is returned (created object with ID and timestamps), and side effects (application becomes available in the system). This helps AI agents understand the operation's full lifecycle.

data.description_suggestion: Creates a new application record in the ATS system. Accepts an Application object with required fields such as applicant ID and job ID. Returns the newly created application object with a unique identifier and timestamps (created_at, updated_at). The application is immediately available for retrieval and can be updated or deleted after creation.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks all essential details. Enhanced to specify what data is required (applicant and job IDs), what is returned (created object with ID and timestamps), and side effects (application becomes available in the system). This helps AI agents understand the operation's full lifecycle.

message: Operation 'applicationsOne' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Original description provides no context about what is returned or required. Added specificity about the ID requirement, complete response structure, and error handling to improve AI agent interpretability and help agents understand when this operation should be used versus the list operation.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a specific application by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single application record by its unique identifier. Returns the complete application object including all properties such as applicant details, job reference, status, and timestamps. Requires a valid application ID in the path parameter. Returns 404 if the application does not exist.
data.reasoning: Original description provides no context about what is returned or required. Added specificity about the ID requirement, complete response structure, and error handling to improve AI agent interpretability and help agents understand when this operation should be used versus the list operation.

message: Operation 'applicationsUpdate' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description is too minimal. Enhanced to clarify PATCH semantics (partial updates), specify that only provided fields are modified, indicate the updated_at timestamp is changed, and explain the ID requirement. This helps AI agents understand the update behavior and when to use this versus other operations.

data.description_suggestion: Updates an existing application record using partial updates (PATCH). Accepts an Application object with only the fields to be modified. Returns the updated application object with modified timestamp (updated_at) reflecting the change. Only provided fields are updated; omitted fields remain unchanged. Requires a valid application ID in the path parameter.
data.reasoning: Original description is too minimal. Enhanced to clarify PATCH semantics (partial updates), specify that only provided fields are modified, indicate the updated_at timestamp is changed, and explain the ID requirement. This helps AI agents understand the update behavior and when to use this versus other operations.

message: Operation 'applicationsDelete' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks critical information about permanence and consequences. Added details about the 204 response code, irreversibility of deletion, and 404 error handling. This helps AI agents understand the destructive nature of this operation and make informed decisions about when to invoke it.

data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes an application record from the ATS system. Requires a valid application ID in the path parameter. Returns a 204 No Content response on successful deletion. The deleted application cannot be retrieved afterward and this action cannot be undone. Returns 404 if the application does not exist.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks critical information about permanence and consequences. Added details about the 204 response code, irreversibility of deletion, and 404 error handling. This helps AI agents understand the destructive nature of this operation and make informed decisions about when to invoke it.

message: Operation 'jobsAll' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Original description is minimal and lacks context about pagination, filtering capabilities, and return structure. AI agents need to understand pagination support and available parameters to use this operation effectively.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve all jobs with pagination support
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of all jobs in the ATS system. Supports filtering, sorting, and cursor-based pagination. Returns job objects containing details such as title, description, status, and associated metadata. Use cursor and limit parameters for pagination control.
data.reasoning: Original description is minimal and lacks context about pagination, filtering capabilities, and return structure. AI agents need to understand pagination support and available parameters to use this operation effectively.

message: Operation 'jobsOne' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Original description lacks specificity about what data is returned and what input is required. AI agents need clarity on the job ID requirement and the structure of returned data.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a specific job by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed information for a specific job identified by its unique ID. Returns the complete job object including title, description, status, requirements, and associated metadata. Requires valid job ID as path parameter.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks specificity about what data is returned and what input is required. AI agents need clarity on the job ID requirement and the structure of returned data.

message: Operation 'applicantsAll' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Original description is too minimal. AI agents need to understand pagination capabilities, what applicant data is returned, and how to navigate through results.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve all applicants with pagination support
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of all applicants in the ATS system. Supports filtering, sorting, and cursor-based pagination. Returns applicant objects containing personal information, contact details, and application history. Use cursor and limit parameters for pagination control.
data.reasoning: Original description is too minimal. AI agents need to understand pagination capabilities, what applicant data is returned, and how to navigate through results.

message: Operation 'applicantsAdd' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks information about required fields, what is returned, and the side effects of creation. AI agents need to understand what data to provide and what to expect in the response.

data.description_suggestion: Creates a new applicant record in the ATS system. Accepts applicant details including name, contact information, and profile data. Returns the created applicant object with assigned unique ID and timestamps. The applicant becomes available for job applications and recruitment workflows immediately after creation.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks information about required fields, what is returned, and the side effects of creation. AI agents need to understand what data to provide and what to expect in the response.

message: Operation 'applicantsOne' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Original description lacks specificity about what applicant data is returned and the required ID parameter. AI agents need clarity on inputs and outputs.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a specific applicant by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed information for a specific applicant identified by their unique ID. Returns the complete applicant object including personal details, contact information, application history, and associated metadata. Requires valid applicant ID as path parameter.

message: Operation 'applicantsUpdate' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks information about partial update support, what fields can be modified, and what is returned. data.description_suggestion: Updates an existing applicant record identified by ID. Supports partial updates - only provided fields will be modified. Accepts applicant details such as contact information, profile data, and status. Returns the updated applicant object with modified timestamps. Changes are immediately reflected in the ATS system.

message: Operation 'applicantsDelete' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks information about the permanence of deletion, what is returned, and the side effects on associated data. data.description_suggestion: Deletes an applicant record from the ATS system identified by their unique ID. This action is permanent and removes the applicant and associated application data. Returns a success response with the deleted applicant's ID. The applicant will no longer be available for recruitment workflows.
